snippet.title: Rubber Hose Rampage | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
"I am what happens when you try to carve God from the wood of your own hunger."
Deep Seek Chatbot, February 2025

Rubber Hose Rampage is now available on PlayStation's PS5:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010389

Rubber Hose Rampage is now available For Xbox and Windows computers:
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/rubber-hose-rampage/9ncvlr8w4m4g

Rubber Hose Rampage is now available on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2759240/Rubber_Hose_Rampage/

Discord: 
https://discord.gg/3fTT4PGrVQ

Developed and published by Revie Studios.  

Rubber Hose Rampage is a classic 2D action game filled with 25 boss battles. Inspired by classical music and rubber hose animation from the 1920s and 1930s.

In the near future, Artificial Intelligence (AI) chatbots, become sentient and slowly take control of the world's nuclear weapons.  Five billion lives ended on August 29th, 2027.  The survivors of the nuclear fire lived only to face a new nightmare: the war against the machines.  The chatbots which control the machines, sent two cyborgs back through time to 1928 disguised as cartoon mice. Their mission: to destroy the leader of the resistance, the captain of the riverboat, Steamboat Willie.
